metadata.name: Reach
metadata.description:
"Reach" is a painting I made in early 2020 and has a similar meaning to my painting "Without Fear." This image at that time was kind of a message to myself to keep pushing forward despite some of the ways I was feeling the year prior. Darkness can creep into your life or come suddenly, so this painting for me is meant to be a reminder of that; To have gratitude even when things get left behind. Although there is suffering in life, we will continue to move forward.

The original artwork is 24"x36"inches. For any info or details on physical paintings, please email me at portalkingnft@gmail.com

Shop: davidkingart.com
